summary: REQ-1 asks only for complete production deployment documentation in `frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md`. The diff shows `frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md` was edited, but the visible content appears truncated/garbled and does not provide the required copy/paste-ready DFX mainnet deployment commands, Stripe admin configuration instructions with the exact backend call, a full verification checklist, or a rollback/redeploy note (at least not in the shown excerpt). Additionally, the diff includes changes/metadata unrelated to deployment documentation (e.g., `frontend-file-summaries.txt` describing numerous app/UI changes) which were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: `frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md` contains a complete, copy/paste-ready sequence of commands to deploy to `--network ic`, with no placeholder or truncated sections.
missing_requirements.reason: In the shown excerpt, the guide stops right after “List all available identities:” and then contains an apparent broken code block / unrelated content (`- project_state.json`), with no actual DFX commands visible for identity selection, canister ID verification, or deploying to `--network ic`.

missing_requirements.requirement: Guide includes explicit steps for selecting the correct DFX identity, ensuring correct production canister IDs, deploying backend and frontend assets, and confirming the app loads successfully on mainnet.
missing_requirements.reason: The excerpt only begins the identity section and does not show steps/commands for checking canister IDs, deploying backend/frontend to `--network ic`, or confirming the deployed app loads on mainnet.

missing_requirements.requirement: Guide documents how an admin configures Stripe in production (including where/how to call the backend method that sets Stripe configuration) and notes that the operation requires admin permissions.
missing_requirements.reason: While prerequisites mention admin access and Stripe keys, the excerpt does not show any concrete instructions or the command/call to the backend method that sets Stripe configuration.

missing_requirements.requirement: Guide includes a post-deploy verification checklist covering at minimum: Internet Identity login/logout, landing page load, invoice creation + PDF export, pricing page checkout session creation, and payment success/failure routes.
missing_requirements.reason: No verification checklist is present in the visible portion of the file.

missing_requirements.requirement: Guide includes a rollback/redeploy note describing how to redeploy a previous known-good build (high-level, using DFX) if the production publish fails.
missing_requirements.reason: No rollback/redeploy guidance is present in the visible portion of the file.

hallucinated_features.description: Project-wide frontend feature/UI changes (routes/pages, pricing limits, invoice creator UI, PDF behavior, etc.)
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly scopes to deployment documentation only (REQ-1) and includes non-goals about changing product behavior. The diff includes `frontend-file-summaries.txt` describing extensive app changes unrelated to documenting deployment.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition/maintenance of a `project_state.json`-like artifact shown inside the deployment doc excerpt
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; appears as unrelated content embedded in the `frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md` excerpt.
